text: Jouni Veli Juhani Seistamo (9 November 1939 â€“ 9 January 2022) was a Finnish professional ice hockey player. He played for Tappara in the SM-liiga. Seistamo was born in Tampere, Finland. He was honored into the Finnish Hockey Hall of Fame in 1986. He also competed at the 1960 Winter Olympics and the 1964 Winter Olympics. Seistamo died in January 2022, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Finnish ice hockey forwards Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Ice hockey people from Tampere
title: Jouni Seistamo
